title: Constructivist-Based Language Concept Learning and Instructional Design Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic language education theories and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Course focused on developing instructional design competencies to facilitate language concept learning for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design language concept learning scenarios by applying constructivist instructional methods.
Learners can observe and analyze the conceptual change process of learners through VR simulations.
Learners can develop hypothetical models of concept learning pathways using multi-level retrospective analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
